title: マジンガーZ対暗黒大将軍

search.original_title: マジンガーZ対暗黒大将軍
search.overview: Kouji and his friends have defeated Dr. Hell and are now enjoying a break, but suddenly a strange prophet appears and warns everyone of an oncoming danger, mechanical beasts never seen before start appearing all around the world wrecking havoc. Its up to Kouji and his Mazinger Z to stand up to this threat but it seems he is vastly outnumber and outmatched.
search.title: 魔神Z对暗黑大将军

title: ゲッターロボ 恐竜! 東京ジャック作戦

search.title: 盖塔机器人 剧场版
